content.query:
CREATE LOGIN [v-sumtri@microsoft.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER

alter role db_owner Add member [v-sumtri@microsoft.com]

SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals

CREATE User [v-sumtri@microsoft.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER

--CREATE USER sumtri FROM LOGIN [v-sumtri@microsoft.com];

alter role db_owner Add member [v-sumtri@microsoft.com]

CREATE User [v-atagr@microsoft.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER
EXEC sp_addrolemember 'db_owner', 'v-atagr@microsoft.com'
